游戏指示字体是系统字体，对话框设计非常粗糙。v社的第一人称游戏交互雕琢都很差，古已有之。

未来世界的机器颓废风格，传送门解谜是亮点，剩下的就是压抑。

这些都不是重点，重点是玩这游戏犯恶心，头晕，想吐。强忍着恶心玩通关过，无法回味。

Acquistato durante i saldi estivi... era da tanto che volevo comprarlo. In questo II capitolo della serie si proseguirà la trama del I Portal (perciò vi consiglio di completare prima quello); il gameplay non è cambiato granché, semplice e rilassante così pure le meccaniche di gioco (sempre quei 4 tasti da premere). Qualche miglioramento nel comparto audio e grafico.
E' un gioco, come si può immaginare, abbastanza breve: tutto sommato è una storia divisa in 8 capitoli con all'interno un numero variabile di livelli (in media una ventina); tra un livello e un'altro si segue la trama del gioco, tutta dialogata, legata all'Aperture Science e alla protagonista. La storia è molto interessante, specialmente per chi viene da Portal I, e vi inciterà a proseguire nei livelli per sapere cosa accadrà. Colpi di scena? Sì.
E' interessante anche la modalità cooperativa, per giocare con i propri amici e divertirsi a risolvere livelli insieme. Inoltre, tramite il Workshop di Steam sarà possibile creare dei livelli propri e metterli a disposizione di tutti.

Давайте я лучше перечислю плюсы, за которые я люблю Портал 2
------------------
+ Озвучка
+ Гемплей
+ Хорошая проработка локаций
+ Кооператив
+ Графика (в 2017 выглядит на много лучше, чем некоторые "новинки")
+ Множество пасхалок
+ Отличая компания
+ Создание своих уровней
И ещё множество плюсов
------------------
Для меня лично это самая лучшая игра.

Such an amazing puzzle game. I love that it teaches you the different objects really fast and it gets hard pretty quicly. Sometimes got stuck but with some thinking you could get through them. The game also has an interesting story going in between of the puzzles and the co-op mode works too. And if you are just for the test chambers then you can choose from the community build ones or make one yourself! Overall amazing experience and a very nice puzzle game here.
This is quite possibly one of my favorite games.. It's a great combination of storytelling, a first person shooter, and puzzle game, with a cool concept to accompany it.

Super jeu : Portal 2 a une histoire et des personnages géniaux, tout en conservant son concept original et tout simplement génial de casse-tête. Un grand oui pour ce jeu :)

Franchement, au début, j'hésitais vraiment à acheter le jeu, j'ai commencer à jouer au mode solo et j'ai adoré. Mon ami est venu me rejoindre et on a fini le mode coop en moins de deux jours, on apprend tout de suite à détester GLaDOS, celle qui nous fait faire les tests et j'me suis tellement amusés, on s'est tapés des barres c'était juste génial ! Si jamais un jour Portal 3 est release, je l'achète direct avec mon pote.

Initially I wasn't too sure about this game. Saw loads of good reviews (which don't always mean a game will be enjoyable or even is as good as people say), watched the Steam video's and in the end saw it on Steam summer Sale for a bargain. Finally decided to purchase it and WOW, what a game. Valve did a superb job with this one (like many other games they have released in the past). I have now also bought Portal 1 as am sure it will be equally as good and entertaining.

Pro's:

Great graphics
Interesting and rather humourous story line.
As you progress the puzzles get more complex which adds to the fun and head scratching.
Ability to do co-op with other players (not tried this yet).


Cons: (well only one I can think of)

The addiction to finish another level may get the wrath of your missus or mother :P

A must have for any game collection.

your looking for a review on this game you've come to the wrong place, but if your looking for an outstanding pie recipe you've come to the right place.

Ingredients:
1. 6 tablespoons unsalted butter
2. 1/2 cup white sugar
3. 1/2 cup brown sugar
4. 1/4 cup water
5. 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon
6. 1 pinch salt
7. 5 apples - peeled, cored and sliced
8. 1 pastry for double-crust pie 

Directions:
1. Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
2. Combine butter, white sugar, brown sugar, water, cinnamon, and salt in a saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a boil, remove from heat and set aside.
3. Roll out half the pastry to fit a 9-inch pie plate. Place bottom crust in pie plate; pour in apple slices.
4. Roll out top crust into a 10-inch circle. Cut into 8 (1-inch) wide strips with a sharp paring knife or pastry wheel. Weave the pastry strips, one at a time, into a lattice pattern. Fold the ends of the lattice strips under the edge of the bottom crust and crimp to seal.
5. Pour butter-sugar mixture over top of pie, coating the lattice, and allowing any remaining sauce to drizzle through the crust.
6. Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes. Reduce heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C), and bake until the crust is golden brown, the caramel on the top crust is set, and the apple filling is bubbling, 35 to 40 more minutes. Allow to cool completely before slicing.

What can you say about Portal 2 that hasn't been said? This is the sequel to a classic Valve game that every single person should have in their library. The puzzles are fun, the story is great, the characters are awesome, what more could you want? Plus, the co-op is also really fun with friends, and the puzzles are great as well. Also, yay workshop support.

Oh and owning the game lets you play Portal Stories: Mel which is also a fantastic free "expansion" if you'd like to call it that. 

Highly recommended.
